评论详情: Well made, light weight, comfortable, pretty.

This is a very pretty top. I ordered L & M. The M actually fits better. I am 5’0” 156#.  I carry most of my weight in my arms & thighs. I do not wear padded bras, 40C. I am curvy shaped, overweight hourglass. I bought several tops for a trip through the Panama Canal. Many of these ports are so hot, I wanted loose tops. It skims my body without clinging. The fabric is soft. I like the embroidery front & upper back. There are no loose threads. I prefer off white colors, but this top has enough blues & grays in the embroidery that it doesn’t make me look washed out. This is one of several different tops I purchased this was the only  Med. The others I purchased large or extra large based on other people’s ratings. It is helpful to know height & weight and body shape and the size purchased. I hope my review helps you.
This is a pretty blouse but just didn’t fit me right, I’m very short, under 5’, be aware.

评论概述: Appears to be made of rayon
评论详情: I love the style, fit and color of this shirt, but I doubt that it's cotton or even a cotton blend. It feels like rayon. For me, it's still a keeper. The gray color is a blue tinged gray that will look great with denim.

This shirt is super cute and reasonably well-made. Fit is pretty close to as expected, although the sleeves are much tighter than they should be. Sleeves definitely don't fit loose like pictured on the model.  Buttons are well-supported with double backings, as are the button holes.  Unfortunately, the embroidery is not as well-supported. The fabric is very thin, and the embroidery does not have any kind of backing to support it, causing the fabric to pucker and pull around the embroidery stitches. It looks odd.  Beyond the lack of backing, though, the embroidery is very well-done.

评论概述: The St. Lareina Peasant Shirt is a Classic Look
评论详情: The St. Lareina Blouse is a fantastic looking and very beautiful peasant style blouse. The steel blue color is exceptional and the embroidered flowers are delicate and varied. I have been impressed with how comfortable the shirt is to wear, naturally falling into place because of the light, cotton material. This shirt is a comfortable to wear anytime you want to look great and impress. It looks perfect with skinny jeans and ballet flats, anytime of day. I have never seen a prettier peasant shirt. Beautiful! 5 Stars

The shirt is very nice quality and beautifully detailed. It’s light weight and TTS. It’s much longer than I anticipated, you will want to size down or tuck for a more modern look. I enjoy the functional buttons, and it washed and dried nicely.  Very nice option if you’re in the market for a boho style top for summer. This would pair beautifully with some gold accessories or brightly colored earrings!

This shirt is absolutely wonderful! It is well-made in the stitching is excellent. It’s a high-quality material and is something that I would buy in the store any day of the week. The price is reasonable for a shirt of this quality to be honest. I would expect to find something like this at a nice boutique or a higher end department store. Shipping was fast as well and it came packaged perfectly. I will be wearing this a lot this summer.

The embroidery on this Mexican Shirt is quite lovely. The fabric is refreshingly smooth. The stitching appears well-crafted. Label says machine washable gentle and that is a plus. I am 5’4” and it reaches just above my knee making it most suitable to pair with leggings. Standing by for the compliments on my first outing. Nicely done.

评论概述: looks Beautiful on, the fit is great
评论详情: This blouse looks Beautiful on, the fit is great. True to size. The color is wonderful. I loved the way this shirt felt. It was lightweight, and the length was perfect. The quality of the stitches is excellent. Highly recommend.
